directions.step:
Blend until mealy. Sprinkle a little ice water over dough, enough to hold together. Roll out to 1/4" thickness, brush with 1/4 cup melted butter. Cut pastry in half. Place halves on top of each other. Roll and cut again. Repeat until you have 16 separate pieces piled up. then chill for 1 hour. Roll pastry again and cut in half. Line bottom of baking dish. Save other half for top.
FILLING:1/2 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. nutmeg 10 lg. apples 1/2 c. molasses 3 tbsp. melted butter 1/4 c. water U Peel and slice the apples. Mix with sugarand spices and put in pastry lined dish. Combine molasses with butter and w Cover with top crust and seal. Bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes. Then reduce heat to 325 degrees. "Dowdy" the dish by cutting the crust into apples with sharp knife. Bake one hour. Serve hot with ice cream or whipped cream.
